titleStmt.title: The beame of brightnesse. Or The three faire sisters of Christendome Containing: a disputation betweene the three famous citties in Europe. Viz. Venice, Paris and London, with their differences. Composed by William Venner, gentleman.
titleStmt.author: Fennor, William.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by G. Eld] for Iohn Wright, and are to be sold at his shop in Newgate Market, neere Christ-church,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Newgate Market, neere Christ-church
